### 6. Which of the following words is most similar in meaning to "dilemma"?

A) predicament
B) solution
C) problem
D) opportunity

```
A) predicament
```

A dilemma is a situation in which a difficult choice has to be made between two or more alternatives, especially ones that are equally undesirable. A predicament is a difficult or unpleasant situation, which is very similar in meaning to dilemma.
